# GitHub Topics for Marketplace Discovery

Add these topics to your GitHub repository for automatic indexing by Claude skills marketplaces:

## Required Topics
- `claude-skill`
- `claude-code`
- `anthropic`
- `agent-skills`

## Recommended Topics
- `javascript`
- `typescript`
- `development-pipeline`
- `code-review`
- `testing`
- `documentation`
- `software-engineering`
- `ai-workflow`

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your GitHub repository
2. Click "About" (⚙️) on the right sidebar
3. Add the topics listed above
4. Click "Save changes"

This ensures automatic indexing by:
- **SkillsMP** (usually within 48 hours)
- **SkillHub** (automatic GitHub scanning)
- Other Claude skills aggregators
